O

onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This method launches the AddAppointment screen when the "Add" button is pressed.
onActionAddCustomerButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersController
This method launches the AddCustomer screen when the "Add" button is pressed.
onActionAppointmentsButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method launches the Appointments screen when the "View Appointments" button is pressed.
onActionAppointmentTypeSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerReportsController
When an appointment type is selected, this method checks if the month has been selected for the report yet.
onActionCancelButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method will return the user to the Appointments screen without validating or saving any new appointment data.
onActionCancelButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method returns the User to the Customers scene without adding any new customer information to the database when the cancel button is pressed.
onActionCancelButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This method will return the user to the Appointments screen without updating any existing appointment data.
onActionCancelButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method returns the User to the Customers scene without updating any customer information in the database when the cancel button is pressed.
onActionContactChosen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.SchedulesController
When a contact is chosen from the contactComboBox, this method uses that Contact's ID and a query to fill the table with only that Contact's appointments.
onActionCountrySelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
When a country is selected from the countryComboBox, this method then sets the divisionComboBox options to the corresponding divisions that are in the selected country.
onActionCountrySelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
When a country is selected from the countryComboBox, this method then sets the divisionComboBox options to the corresponding divisions that are in the selected country.
onActionCustomersButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method launches the Customers screen when the "View Customers" button is pressed.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This method deletes an appointment that was selected from the table from the database.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersController
This method deletes a Customer that was selected from the table from the database.
onActionDisplayAllAppointments(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This function displays all the appointments in the database in the appointments table when the user selects the "All Time" radio button.
onActionDisplayAppointmentsThisMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This function displays only the appointments in the database that are occurring in the current month in the appointments table when the user selects the "This Month" radio button.
onActionDisplayAppointmentsThisWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This function displays only the appointments in the database that are occurring in the current week in the appointments table when the user selects the "This Week" radio button.
onActionLoginButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
When the login button is pressed, this method gets the entered username and password from the fields and checks if it's a valid combination in the database with a query.
onActionMonthSelected(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerReportsController
When a month is selected, this method checks if an appointment type has been selected.
onActionPercentageMonthChosen(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerReportsController
When a month is selected from the percentageMonthComboBox this method calculates what percentage of all customers in the database have at least one scheduled appointment in the selected month.
onActionReturnToMainMenu(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomerReportsController
This function returns the user to the MainMenu screen.
onActionReturnToMainMenuButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This method returns the user to the MainMenu screen without affecting any of the appointments.
onActionReturnToMainMenuButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersController
This method returns the user to the MainMenu screen without affecting any of the appointments.
onActionReturnToMainMenuButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.SchedulesController
When the "Main Menu" buttons is pressed, this function sends the user back to the Main Menu screen.
onActionSaveButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
When the save button is pressed, this method will validate the input appointment start and end date and times.
onActionSaveButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
When the save button is clicked, this method pulls all the information from the text-fields and comboBoxes and uses it to insert a new customer into the database with a query.
onActionSaveButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
When the save button is pressed, this method will validate the input appointment start and end date and times.
onActionSaveButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
When the save button is clicked, this method pulls all the information from the text-fields and comboBoxes and uses it to update an existing customer in the database with a query utilizing the customer's ID.
onActionSchedulesButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method launches the ContactSchedules screen when the "Contact Schedules" button is pressed.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AppointmentsController
This method launches the UpdateAppointment screen when the "Update" button is pressed and sends the selected appointment from the table to the UpdateAppointment screen by setting a static appointment member in that class.
onActionUpdateCustomerButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomersController
This method launches the UpdateCustomer screen when the "Update" button is pressed.
onCustomerReportsButtonPressed(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainMenuController
This method launches the CustomerReports screen when the "Customer Reports" button is pressed.
openConnection() - Static method in class utility.JDBC
This function opens a connection to the database
